attributes.action: Please build a new Railway Line from Blackpool/Fleetwood to Lancaster
attributes.additional_details: Please could you build a new rail line (Poulton/Fleetwood is reopening and Poulton curve (allows direct Blackpool/Fleetwood trains for Lancaster), i thought of proposing a new line from Burn Naze (triangle spur connects/bypasses Fleetwood as it makes Fleetwood a terminus/interchange station), rail line then crosses River Wyre over a new rail bridge, first between Stalmine/Preesall, second between Skate Park/Eagland Hill, third between Cockerham/Forton, passes Bay Horse/Galgate, connecting onto West Coast Main Line at Bailrigg/Scotforth, this allows a direct rail route from Blackpool to Lake District/Scotland without having to change/reverse at Preston.
